# fmisc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Various utilities for software development in R.

## Installation

You can install the development version of fmisc from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("fabiandistler/fmisc")
```
